typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTCustomerTable
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomerTable
SalesLTCustomerTable derive(CreatedHash = sha1(FirstName+LastName+CompanyName)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimCustomerTable exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimCustomerTable lookup(SalesLTCustomerTable@CustomerID == DimCustomerTable@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate),currentTimestamp(),InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesLTCustomerTable@CustomerID,
		Title = SalesLTCustomerTable@Title,
		FirstName = SalesLTCustomerTable@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SalesLTCustomerTable@MiddleName,
		LastName = SalesLTCustomerTable@LastName,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

sqlReaderQuery.value: select e.BusinessEntityID, e.JobTitle, e.BirthDate, e.HireDate, e.MaritalStatus, d.departmentid from HumanResources.Employee as e inner join HumanResources.EmployeeDepartmentHistory as d on e.BusinessEntityID = d.BusinessEntityID where DepartmentID=@{item().DepartmentID}
